mutants.code:
def find_student_with_max_average(N, S):
    max_avg = 1
    max_avg_students = []
    for student in S:
        name = student[0]
        marks = list(map(int, student[1:4]))
        avg = sum(marks) // 3
        if avg > max_avg:
            max_avg = avg
            max_avg_students = [name]
        elif avg == max_avg:
            max_avg_students.append(name)
    result = ' '.join(max_avg_students) + ' ' + str(max_avg)
    return result
